name: Shield Knights
description:
Requires XBOX 360 controllers!

4 player game!

Two players play as the shield knights whose job it is to adventure through the air fields and reach the end. Use your shield to block incoming projectiles and try not to get hit! Blocking projectiles which are the same colour as yourself will increase your teams life. Blocking the wrong colour will simply deflect them. Your life is shared so work together!

Controls: Left stick to move, right stick to position shield, A to jump

Also, beware the invincible pong ball.

2 more players will be playing pong on top of the game. Their job is to destroy the shield knights with the help of their invincible pong ball. It is unblockable!

Controls: Left stick to move, Right stick to tilt
